[[inst_hl_sb_pr]]
==== HL.SB.PR

*Syntax:* hl.sb.pr SrcD, [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}>], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sb_pr.svg[HL.SB.PR encoding,width=800]
